QuestData.Title: Kang Bramblestaff
QuestData.Description: Kang's pride regularly becomes overconfidence, which often leads him down dangerous paths. His current path is as dangerous as any - he is headed deep into the Krasarang Wilds.$b$bI wouldn't normally ask a favor of a stranger, but... would you make sure that he is well? It would give me relief to know that a brave $r was looking out for him.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Kang Bramblestaff at Thunder Cleft in the Krasarang Wilds.
